nodes.text: Tom Angleberger is an American children's author and the creator of the Origami Yoda series of books. He also wrote the novel Return of the Jedi: Beware the Power of the Dark Side!, a young-reader adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, in advance of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens and is the author of the young-readers novel The Mighty Chewbacca in the Forest of Fear!, a tie-in to the film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
